item.description:
This is a Beginner Level Group Class on Mondays at 6pm, starting on January 7th. Salsa is one of the most popular dances in the Massachusetts Dance Clubs. Come join our Beginner Salsa class and develop a style of Salsa you can call your own.

Already know your basics in Salsa? Great! Try our “Latin Fusion” class for intermediate dances on Mondays at 8pm. You will learn great moves similar in Salsa, Cha-Cha & Rumba!

Try a Single Class for $15.00 Per Person, or only $40 for 4 classes in January.

Singles are Welcome!

Advance registration and more info here: http://americanballroomlatin.com/

group.name: Salsa, Swing, Latin & Ballroom Dancers of Metro Worcester

item.name: Learn Salsa Dance in 4 weeks!
